Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.repositories

Interface BookRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Book,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Book>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Book,Integer>
@Repository public interface BookRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Book,Integer>
Repository interface for accessing book data.

  • Method Details

    • findBooks

      @Query("SELECT b\nFROM Book b\nWHERE (:title IS NULL OR b.title ILIKE %:title%)\nAND (:author IS NULL OR b.author ILIKE %:author%)\nAND (:description IS NULL OR b.description ILIKE %:description%)\nAND (:minPrice IS NULL OR b.price >= :minPrice)\nAND (:maxPrice IS NULL OR b.price <= :maxPrice)\nAND (:genre IS NULL OR b.id IN (SELECT g.book.id FROM Genre g WHERE g.genre ILIKE %:genre%))\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Book> findBooks(String title, String genre, String author, String description, Double minPrice, Double maxPrice, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of books filtered by the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the books to search for (optional)
      genre - the genre of the books to search for (optional)
      author - the author of the books to search for (optional)
      description - the description of the books to search for (optional)
      minPrice - the minimum price of the books to search for (optional)
      maxPrice - the maximum price of the books to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of books

    • existsByIsbn

      boolean existsByIsbn(String isbn)
      Checks if a book with the given ISBN exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the book exists, false otherwise

    • existsByIsbnAndIdNot

      boolean existsByIsbnAndIdNot(String isbn, Integer bookID)
      Checks if a book with the given ISBN exists in the database, excluding the book with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to be checked
      bookID - the ID of the book to be excluded from the check
      Returns:
      true if the book exists, false otherwise
